Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "Generic:clothing:boots"

"Generic:clothing:sandals"
"Generic:clothing:shoes"

"Generic:clothing:leggings"
"Generic:clothing:garter"
"FROM THE WAIST DOWN: A Winter Foot \& Legwear Catalog"

"CONTENTS\
\
2. Boots\
3. Tall Boots\
4. Sandals\
5. Shoes\
6. Slippers\
7. Hose\
8. Trunkhose\
9. Leggings\
10. Garter\
11. Updates\
\
All items offered in this catalog are manufactured in accordance with Guild of Tailors and Guild of Cobblers guidelines, and will accept all standard customization options of Material, Fit, Color and Embroidering."
"A pair of plain Boots. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Tall Boots. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Sandals. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Shoes. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Slippers. One size fits all."
"Plain Hose. One size fits all."
"Plain Trunkhose. One size fits all."
"Plain Leggings. One size fits all."
"A plain Garter. One size fits all."

"UPDATES\
\
New legwear items are always being commissioned by the Master Tailors and Cobblers of Castle Marrach. The text of this catalog will mysteriously update itself as new choices become available.\
\
Please bring typographical errors or other textual problems found in this volume to the attention of any StoryHost."
"[An advertisement for the Guild of Cobblers.]"
"[An advertisement for the Royal Winter Clothiers Shoppe.]"
"[An advertisement for the Guild of Tailors.]"
"[An advertisement for the Guild of Glovers.]"
"[An advertisement for the Guild of Hatters.]"
